name: peele the robot the saviour
description:
join bob and peele  the robot in there jouny to save there city from the evil mayor who realeased thousands of evil robots. sneak around the robots and kill by sniping them with peele. i recomend before playing reading the read me note i put in the file

if you cant find it heres what is in there just in case:)

hi please dont move any of the files out of there because it can cause some isuues with loading files. thanks!

if its not clear the keys to the game are:

C: hold to grab peele, realse to throw him, just press to enter the car or the mayors house

X: skip cutcenes

SPACE: jumping

Aroows: moving around

pro tips

try throwing the robot on the enemy from under the platforms

if you get stuck (because it's hard at the start) there will be a video with the gameplay at the game window or a video link

and if you looking for the code source it is in the game scripts folder but i don't recomend you see beacuse it isn't that good:)
